headline: Steel Dynamics (STLD): Is the Recent Share Price Surge Fully Reflecting Its Valuation?
summary: Steel Dynamics (STLD) has quietly rewarded patient investors, with the stock up roughly 24% over the past 3 months and about 58% over the past year, far outpacing many industrial peers. See our latest analysis for Steel Dynamics. At a share price of $176.06, Steel Dynamics has built steady momentum, with a solid 90 day share price return and strong one year total shareholder return suggesting investors are warming to its growth prospects and earnings resilience. If Steel Dynamics' recent run...
